title: [Adventurer's Guild, Lobby]
description: Airy and spacious, the lower half of the chamber's walls are trimmed with carved mahogany panels with matching floor tiles.  Raised murals depict various scenes of brave adventurers battling foes with their ladies fair in the background cheering them onward.  Scattered around the area are chairs which provide a little respite for the weary.

Scattered around the area are chairs which provide a little respite for the weary.

Airy and spacious, the lower half of the chamber's walls are trimmed with carved mahogany panels with matching floor tiles.  Raised murals depict various scenes of brave adventurers battling foes with their ladies fair in the background cheering them onward.  Overhead, the sunlight projecting through the stained-glass skylight sprays the room with a rainbow of colors.  Scattered around the area are chairs which provide a little respite for the weary.
paths: Obvious exits: southeast, south, southwest, out
